ModMetaData.name: LMC007.菜园子罐头食物
ModMetaData.author: dismarzero
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 需要搭配VGP Vegetable Garden使用，国内貌似翻译是叫菜园子（真有特色！），可以将原版的生食，蔬菜及肉类打包成罐头防止腐烂，同时也兼容菜园子MOD新增的生食蔬菜肉类和水果。罐头由需要人工操作的工作台或全自动机器生产，原材料为食物和钢铁（想想也没问题罐头就是铁做的）。需要研究菜园子选项卡中的相关科技以解锁工作台、机器和配方。 VGP Garden Canning (Requires Vegetable Garden, loaded first) Garden Canning addes two ways of canning food. With reserach. A canning stove that pawns can food at. It is powered by steel. And a canning factory, which pawns will load with food and will automatically can the food after an amount of time. Worktables and recipe : Canning Table -Canned meals -Canned vegetables -Canned meats -Canned fruits
